```{python}
#| vscode: {languageId: python}
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

points = np.array([3,7,1,9,4])

plt.plot(points, color = "red")
plt.xlabel("Time (in light years) (jk hours) ", fontsize = "16")
plt.ylabel("Puppers In Sight", fontsize = "16")
plt.title("The Importance Of Puppies", fontsize="26")
plt.show()
```
